sqlMap.statement: SELECT COUNT(RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PK) FROM ROSS_INTFC_CONTR RIC WHERE RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RIC.PRNT_BLLG_MSTR_ID = #prntBllgMstrId# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_STS_CD = #rossIntfcProcStsCd# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PROC_CD = #rossIntfcContrProcCd# AND RIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT COUNT(RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PK) FROM ROSS_INTFC_CONTR RIC ,DS_RTL_DLR_INFO DRDI WHERE RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RIC.BLLG_MSTR_PK = #bllgMstrPk# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_STS_CD = #rossIntfcProcStsCd# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PROC_CD = #rossIntfcContrProcCd# AND RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DRDI.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RIC.SVC_DLR_CD = DRDI.RTL_DLR_CD AND RIC.RTL_DIV_CD = DRDI.RTL_DIV_CD AND DRDI.EFF_FROM_DT <= #slsDt# AND NVL(DRDI.EFF_THRU_DT, '99991231') >= #slsDt# AND RIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DRDI.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT RIC.SVC_DLR_CD ,RIC.SER_NUM FROM ROSS_INTFC_CONTR RIC WHERE RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RIC.BLLG_MSTR_PK = #bllgMstrPk# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_STS_CD = #rossIntfcProcStsCd# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PROC_CD = #rossIntfcContrProcCd# AND RIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ROWNUM = 1
SELECT COUNT(CFSDV.RTL_DLR_CD) FROM CSA_FEDEX_SVC_DLR_V CFSDV WHERE CFSDV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCdAbr# AND CFSDV.RTL_DLR_CD = #rtlDlrCd# AND CFSDV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
SELECT COUNT(CFIV.SER_NUM) FROM CSA_FEDEX_ISTL_V CFIV WHERE CFIV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCdAbr# AND CFIV.SER_NUM = #serNum# AND CFIV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT COUNT(RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PK) FROM ROSS_INTFC_CONTR RIC ,SVC_MACH_MSTR SMM ,SVC_CONFIG_MSTR SCM ,DS_MDL_EOL DME ,DS_MDL_EOL_STS DMES WHERE RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RIC.BLLG_MSTR_PK = #bllgMstrPk# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_STS_CD = #rossIntfcProcStsCd# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PROC_CD = #rossIntfcContrProcCd# AND RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SMM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RIC.SER_NUM = SMM.SER_NUM AND SMM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SCM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SMM.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK = SCM.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK AND SCM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DME.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SCM.MDL_ID = DME.MDL_ID AND DME.DS_MDL_EOL_DT < #slsDt# AND DME.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DMES.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DME.DS_MDL_EOL_STS_CD = DMES.DS_MDL_EOL_STS_CD AND DMES.EOL_CONTR_FLG = #eolContrFlg# AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM DS_MDL_EOL_EX DMEE ,DS_MDL_EOL_STS DMES WHERE DMEE.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SCM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DMEE.MDL_ID = SCM.MDL_ID AND DMEE.SER_NUM = RIC.SER_NUM AND DMEE.DS_MDL_EOL_DT >= #slsDt# AND DMEE.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DMES.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DMEE.DS_MDL_EOL_STS_CD = DMES.DS_MDL_EOL_STS_CD AND DMES.EOL_CONTR_FLG = #eolContrFlg# AND DMEE.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DMES.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ) AND RIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SMM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SCM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DME.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DMES.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT COUNT(DCI.DS_CONTR_INTFC_PK) FROM DS_CONTR_INTFC DCI WHERE DCI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND DCI.DS_CONTR_SRC_REF_NUM = #prntBllgMstrId# AND DCI.DS_CONTR_INTFC_DT = #slsDt# AND DCI.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT COUNT(RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PK) FROM ROSS_INTFC_CONTR RIC ,CSA_FEDEX_SVC_DLR_V CFSDV WHERE RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RIC.BLLG_MSTR_PK = #bllgMstrPk# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_STS_CD = #rossIntfcProcStsCd# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PROC_CD = #rossIntfcContrProcCd# AND RIC.SVC_DLR_CD = CFSDV.RTL_DLR_CD AND CFSDV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCdAbr# AND RIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CFSDV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT COUNT(RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PK) FROM ROSS_INTFC_CONTR RIC WHERE RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RIC.BLLG_MSTR_PK = #bllgMstrPk# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_STS_CD = #rossIntfcProcStsCd# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PROC_CD = #rossIntfcContrProcCd# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_MODE_CD = #rossIntcfProcModeCd# AND RIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PK FROM ROSS_INTFC_CONTR RIC WHERE RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RIC.PRNT_BLLG_MSTR_ID = #prntBllgMstrId# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_STS_CD = #rossIntfcProcStsCd# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PROC_CD = #rossIntfcContrProcCd# AND RIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
SELECT NVL(MAX(DCI.DS_CONTR_INTFC_BAT_SQ), 0) + 1 FROM DS_CONTR_INTFC DCI WHERE DCI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND DCI.DS_CONTR_INTFC_DT = #slsDt# AND DCI.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT DCIDR.MTR_EST_TP_CD ,DCIDR.BEF_END_RNW_DAYS_AOT ,DCIDR.CONTR_UPLFT_TP_CD ,DCIDR.UPLFT_PRC_METH_CD ,DCIDR.UPLFT_BASE_PRC_UP_RATIO ,DCIDR.UPLFT_MTR_PRC_UP_RATIO ,DCIDR.CONTR_CLO_DAY ,DCIDR.CONTR_BLLG_DAY ,DCIDR.BLLG_THRU_DT ,DCIDR.BLLG_ROLL_OVER_RATIO ,DCIDR.PRINT_DTL_FLG FROM DS_CONTR_INTFC_DEF_RULE DCIDR WHERE DCIDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND DCIDR.CONTR_INTFC_SRC_TP_CD = #contrIntfcSrcTpCd#
AND NVL(DCIDR.EFF_FROM_DT, #slsDt#) <= #slsDt#
AND DCIDR.ENBL_FLG = #enblFlg# AND DCIDR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT DC.DS_CONTR_NUM FROM DS_CONTR DC ,DS_CONTR_STS_V DCSV WHERE DC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND DC.SVC_CONTR_REF_CMNT_TXT = #prntBllgMstrId# AND DC.DS_CONTR_SRC_TP_CD = #dsContrSrcTpCd# AND DC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DCSV.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DC.DS_CONTR_PK = DCSV.DS_CONTR_PK
#dsContrCtrlStsCd[]#
AND DC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DCSV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT BTC.SELL_TO_CUST_CD ,DRDI.BILL_TO_CUST_CD ,CP.CTAC_PSN_PK ,CP.CTAC_PSN_FIRST_NM ,CP.CTAC_PSN_LAST_NM ,STC.DS_BILL_TGTR_FLG ,DACP.PMT_TERM_CASH_DISC_CD
,STC.DS_BILL_TGTR_FLG ,STC.DEF_BASE_CYCLE_CD ,STC.DEF_USG_CYCLE_CD
FROM ROSS_INTFC_CONTR RIC ,DS_RTL_DLR_INFO DRDI ,BILL_TO_CUST BTC ,SELL_TO_CUST STC ,DS_ACCT_CR_PRFL DACP ,DS_CTAC_PSN_RELN DCPR ,CTAC_PSN CP WHERE RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RIC.BLLG_MSTR_PK = #bllgMstrPk# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_STS_CD = #rossIntfcProcStsCd# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PROC_CD = #rossIntfcContrProcCd# AND RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DRDI.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RIC.SVC_DLR_CD = DRDI.RTL_DLR_CD AND RIC.RTL_DIV_CD = DRDI.RTL_DIV_CD AND DRDI.EFF_FROM_DT <= #slsDt# AND NVL(DRDI.EFF_THRU_DT, '99991231') >= #slsDt# AND DRDI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = BTC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DRDI.BILL_TO_CUST_CD = BTC.BILL_TO_CUST_CD AND BTC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = STC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND BTC.SELL_TO_CUST_CD = STC.SELL_TO_CUST_CD AND BTC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DACP.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND BTC.SELL_TO_CUST_CD = DACP.DS_ACCT_NUM AND BTC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DCPR.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND BTC.SELL_TO_CUST_CD = DCPR.DS_ACCT_NUM AND DCPR.EFF_FROM_DT <= #slsDt# AND NVL(DCPR.EFF_THRU_DT, '99991231') >= #slsDt# AND DCPR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CP.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DCPR.CTAC_PSN_PK = CP.CTAC_PSN_PK AND RIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DRDI.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND BTC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND STC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DACP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DCPR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY DCPR.DS_CTAC_PSN_RELN_PK ASC

SELECT RCBTM.SVC_CONTR_BR_CD ,RCBTM.TOC_CD ,RCBTM.CONTR_ADMIN_PSN_CD FROM ROSS_INTFC_CONTR RIC ,ROSS_CONTR_BR_TOC_MAP RCBTM WHERE RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RIC.BLLG_MSTR_PK = #bllgMstrPk# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_STS_CD = #rossIntfcProcStsCd# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PROC_CD = #rossIntfcContrProcCd# AND RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RCBTM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RIC.RTL_DIV_CD = RCBTM.RTL_DIV_CD AND RIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RCBTM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT RCSPM.SVC_PGM_MDSE_CD FROM ROSS_INTFC_CONTR RIC ,ROSS_CONTR_SVC_PGM_MAP RCSPM WHERE RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RIC.BLLG_MSTR_PK = #bllgMstrPk# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_STS_CD = #rossIntfcProcStsCd# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PROC_CD = #rossIntfcContrProcCd# AND RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RCSPM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RIC.RTL_DIV_CD = RCSPM.RTL_DIV_CD AND RIC.SPLY_INCL_FLG = RCSPM.SPLY_INCL_FLG AND RIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RCSPM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT RCMRM.MTR_READ_METH_CD FROM ROSS_INTFC_CONTR RIC ,ROSS_CONTR_MTR_READ_MAP RCMRM WHERE RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RIC.BLLG_MSTR_PK = #bllgMstrPk# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_STS_CD = #rossIntfcProcStsCd# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PROC_CD = #rossIntfcContrProcCd# AND RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RCMRM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RIC.MRCF_TP_CD = RCMRM.MRCF_TP_CD AND RIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RCMRM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT CFSDV.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,CFSDV.RTL_DLR_CD FROM ROSS_INTFC_CONTR RIC ,CSA_FEDEX_SVC_DLR_V CFSDV WHERE RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RIC.BLLG_MSTR_PK = #bllgMstrPk# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_STS_CD = #rossIntfcProcStsCd# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PROC_CD = #rossIntfcContrProcCd# AND RIC.SVC_DLR_CD = CFSDV.RTL_DLR_CD AND CFSDV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCdAbr# AND RIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CFSDV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PK ,RIC.BLLG_MSTR_PK ,RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_MODE_CD ,RIC.SER_NUM ,SMM.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK ,SMM.MDSE_CD ,SCM.MDL_ID ,MN.T_MDL_NM ,RIC.CONTR_START_DT ,RIC.CONTR_END_DT ,RIC.MLY_BASE_COMP_AMT ,RIC.PMT_TERM_AOT ,RIC.RTL_DIV_CD ,SMM.PRF_TECH_CD ,RIC.SPLY_INCL_FLG
,RIC.MRCF_TP_CD
,RIC.BLLG_CYCLE_CD ,RIC.BLLG_TMG_TP_CD
,RIC.TRMN_DT
,RIC.BLLG_DAY
FROM ROSS_INTFC_CONTR RIC ,SVC_MACH_MSTR SMM ,SVC_CONFIG_MSTR SCM ,MDL_NM MN WHERE RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RIC.BLLG_MSTR_PK = #bllgMstrPk# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_STS_CD = #rossIntfcProcStsCd# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PROC_CD = #rossIntfcContrProcCd# AND RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SMM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RIC.SER_NUM = SMM.SER_NUM AND SMM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SCM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SMM.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK = SCM.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK AND SCM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = MN.T_GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SCM.MDL_ID = MN.T_MDL_ID AND RIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SMM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SCM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND MN.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PK ,RIC.BLLG_MSTR_PK ,RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_MODE_CD ,RIC.SER_NUM ,SMM.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK ,SMM.MDSE_CD ,SCM.MDL_ID ,MN.T_MDL_NM ,RIC.CONTR_START_DT ,RIC.CONTR_END_DT ,RIC.MLY_BASE_COMP_AMT ,RIC.PMT_TERM_AOT ,RIC.RTL_DIV_CD ,RICU.MLY_COPY_INCL_COMP_QTY ,MAX(RICU.XS_MTR_COMP_AMT_RATE) AS XS_MTR_COMP_AMT_RATE ,RICU.BLLG_MSTR_BLLG_MTR_PK
,RIC.MRCF_TP_CD
,RIC.BLLG_CYCLE_CD
,RIC.TRMN_DT
,RIC.BLLG_DAY
FROM ROSS_INTFC_CONTR RIC ,ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_USG RICU ,SVC_MACH_MSTR SMM ,SVC_CONFIG_MSTR SCM ,MDL_NM MN WHERE RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RIC.BLLG_MSTR_PK = #bllgMstrPk# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_STS_CD = #rossIntfcProcStsCd# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PROC_CD = #rossIntfcContrProcCd# AND RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RICU.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PK = RICU.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PK AND RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SMM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RIC.SER_NUM = SMM.SER_NUM AND SMM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SCM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SMM.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK = SCM.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK AND SCM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = MN.T_GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SCM.MDL_ID = MN.T_MDL_ID AND RIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RICU.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SMM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SCM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND MN.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' GROUP BY RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PK ,RIC.BLLG_MSTR_PK ,RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_MODE_CD ,RIC.SER_NUM ,SMM.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK ,SMM.MDSE_CD ,SCM.MDL_ID ,MN.T_MDL_NM ,RIC.CONTR_START_DT ,RIC.CONTR_END_DT ,RIC.MLY_BASE_COMP_AMT ,RIC.PMT_TERM_AOT ,RIC.RTL_DIV_CD ,RICU.MLY_COPY_INCL_COMP_QTY ,RICU.BLLG_MSTR_BLLG_MTR_PK
,RIC.MRCF_TP_CD
,RIC.BLLG_CYCLE_CD ,RIC.BLLG_TMG_TP_CD
,RIC.TRMN_DT
,RIC.BLLG_DAY
ORDER BY XS_MTR_COMP_AMT_RATE ASC

SELECT RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PK ,RIC.BLLG_MSTR_PK ,RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_MODE_CD ,RIC.SER_NUM ,SMM.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK ,SMM.MDSE_CD ,SCM.MDL_ID ,MN.T_MDL_NM ,RIC.CONTR_START_DT ,RIC.CONTR_END_DT ,RIC.MLY_BASE_COMP_AMT ,RIC.PMT_TERM_AOT ,RIC.RTL_DIV_CD
,RIC.MRCF_TP_CD
,RIC.BLLG_CYCLE_CD ,RIC.BLLG_TMG_TP_CD
,RIC.TRMN_DT
,RIC.BLLG_DAY
FROM ROSS_INTFC_CONTR RIC ,SVC_MACH_MSTR SMM ,SVC_CONFIG_MSTR SCM ,MDL_NM MN WHERE RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RIC.PRNT_BLLG_MSTR_ID = #bllgMstrPk# AND RIC.BLLG_MSTR_PK <> #bllgMstrPk# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_STS_CD = #rossIntfcProcStsCd# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PROC_CD = #rossIntfcContrProcCd# AND RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SMM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RIC.SER_NUM = SMM.SER_NUM AND SMM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SCM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SMM.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK = SCM.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK AND SCM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = MN.T_GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SCM.MDL_ID = MN.T_MDL_ID AND RIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SMM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SCM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND MN.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT RIC.BLLG_MSTR_PK ,SMM.SER_NUM ,SMM.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK ,SMM.MDSE_CD ,SPM.MDL_MTR_LB_CD ,ML.MTR_LB_NM ,ML.BW_MTR_FLG ,ML.COLOR_MTR_FLG FROM ROSS_INTFC_CONTR RIC ,SVC_MACH_MSTR SMM ,SVC_PHYS_MTR SPM ,SVC_CONFIG_MSTR SCM ,MDL_NM MN ,MTR_LB ML WHERE RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RIC.BLLG_MSTR_PK = #bllgMstrPk# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_STS_CD = #rossIntfcProcStsCd# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PROC_CD = #rossIntfcContrProcCd# AND RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SMM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RIC.SER_NUM = SMM.SER_NUM AND SMM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SPM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SMM.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK = SPM.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK AND SMM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SCM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SMM.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK = SCM.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK AND SCM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = MN.T_GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SCM.MDL_ID = MN.T_MDL_ID AND SPM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = ML.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SPM.MDL_MTR_LB_CD = ML.MTR_LB_CD AND RIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SMM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SPM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SCM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND MN.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ML.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT RIC.BLLG_MSTR_PK ,SMM.SER_NUM ,SMM.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK ,SMM.MDSE_CD ,RICU.BLLG_MSTR_BLLG_MTR_PK ,RICU.MLY_COPY_INCL_COMP_QTY ,RICU.XS_MTR_COMP_COPY_QTY ,RICU.XS_MTR_COMP_AMT_RATE FROM ROSS_INTFC_CONTR RIC ,ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_USG RICU ,SVC_MACH_MSTR SMM ,SVC_CONFIG_MSTR SCM ,MDL_NM MN WHERE RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RIC.BLLG_MSTR_PK = #bllgMstrPk# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_STS_CD = #rossIntfcProcStsCd# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PROC_CD = #rossIntfcContrProcCd# AND RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RICU.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PK = RICU.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PK AND RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SMM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RIC.SER_NUM = SMM.SER_NUM AND SMM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SCM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SMM.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK = SCM.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK AND SCM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = MN.T_GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SCM.MDL_ID = MN.T_MDL_ID AND RIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RICU.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SMM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SCM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND MN.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY RICU.BLLG_MSTR_BLLG_MTR_PK ASC ,RICU.XS_MTR_COMP_AMT_RATE DESC

SELECT RIC.BLLG_MSTR_PK ,RIC.SER_NUM ,DC.DS_CONTR_NUM ,DSC.VND_CD ,DSC.TECH_TOC_CD ,DSC.EFF_FROM_DT ,DSC.EFF_THRU_DT ,DSC.BASE_PRC_DEAL_AMT ,DSC.ADMIN_PRC_DEAL_AMT ,DSC.PREPD_MAINT_FLG ,DSC.BW_MTR_ALWNC_CNT ,DSC.COLOR_MTR_ALWNC_CNT ,DSC.BW_MTR_PRC_AMT_RATE ,DSC.COLOR_MTR_PRC_AMT_RATE ,DSC.SPLY_INCL_FLG ,DSC.BLLG_CYCLE_CD ,DSC.DLR_FLEET_FLG ,DSC.DLR_FLEET_NUM FROM ROSS_INTFC_CONTR RIC ,SVC_MACH_MSTR SMM ,DS_CONTR_DTL DCD ,DS_CONTR DC ,DS_SUB_CONTR DSC WHERE RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PK = #rossIntfcContrPk# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_STS_CD = #rossIntfcProcStsCd# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PROC_CD = #rossIntfcContrProcCd# AND RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SMM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RIC.SER_NUM = SMM.SER_NUM AND SMM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DCD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SMM.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK = DCD.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK AND DCD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DCD.DS_CONTR_PK = DC.DS_CONTR_PK AND DCD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DSC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DCD.DS_CONTR_DTL_PK = DSC.DS_CONTR_DTL_PK AND DSC.CONTR_TRMN_FLG = #contrTrmnFlg# AND DSC.EFF_FROM_DT <= #slsDt# AND NVL(DSC.EFF_THRU_DT, '99991231') >= #slsDt# AND RIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SMM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DCD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DSC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT V.VND_CD ,SP.PSN_CD ,RIC.RTL_DIV_CD FROM ROSS_INTFC_CONTR RIC
,VND V ,CTAC_PSN CP ,S21_PSN SP ,DS_CTAC_PSN_RELN CPR
,CTAC_TP CT
WHERE RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PK = #rossIntfcContrPk# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_STS_CD = #rossIntfcProcStsCd# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PROC_CD = #rossIntfcContrProcCd#
AND RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = V.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RIC.SVC_DLR_CD = V.SPLY_SITE_DEAL_CD
AND V.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CPR.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND V.LOC_NUM = CPR.LOC_NUM AND CPR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CP.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND CPR.CTAC_PSN_PK = CP.CTAC_PSN_PK
AND CP.CTAC_PSN_ACTV_FLG = #ctacPsnActvFlg# AND CP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SP.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND CP.CTAC_PSN_PK = SP.CTAC_PSN_PK AND SP.EFF_FROM_DT <= #slsDt# AND NVL(SP.EFF_THRU_DT, '99991231') >= #slsDt# AND SP.DEL_FLG = #delFlg#
AND CPR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CT.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND CPR.CTAC_TP_CD = CT.CTAC_TP_CD AND CT.SPLY_IND_FLG = #splyIndFlg# AND CT.ACTV_FLG = #actvFlg# AND CT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND RIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND V.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CPR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY CP.CTAC_PSN_PK ASC

SELECT V.VND_CD ,SP.PSN_CD ,DSC.EFF_FROM_DT ,DSC.EFF_THRU_DT ,DSC.ADMIN_PRC_DEAL_AMT ,DSC.PREPD_MAINT_FLG ,DSC.BLLG_CYCLE_CD ,DSC.DLR_FLEET_FLG ,DSC.DLR_FLEET_NUM FROM ROSS_INTFC_CONTR RIC ,SVC_MACH_MSTR SMM ,DS_CONTR_DTL DCD ,DS_CONTR DC ,DS_SUB_CONTR DSC ,VND V ,CTAC_PSN CP ,S21_PSN SP ,DS_CTAC_PSN_RELN CPR
,CTAC_TP CT
WHERE RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PK = #rossIntfcContrPk# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_STS_CD = #rossIntfcProcStsCd# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PROC_CD = #rossIntfcContrProcCd# AND RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SMM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RIC.SER_NUM = SMM.SER_NUM AND SMM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DCD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SMM.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK = DCD.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK AND DCD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DCD.DS_CONTR_PK = DC.DS_CONTR_PK AND DCD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DSC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DCD.DS_CONTR_DTL_PK = DSC.DS_CONTR_DTL_PK AND DSC.CONTR_TRMN_FLG = #contrTrmnFlg# AND DSC.EFF_FROM_DT <= #slsDt# AND NVL(DSC.EFF_THRU_DT, '99991231') >= #slsDt# AND RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = V.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RIC.SVC_DLR_CD = V.SPLY_SITE_DEAL_CD
AND V.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CPR.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND V.LOC_NUM = CPR.LOC_NUM AND CPR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CP.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND CPR.CTAC_PSN_PK = CP.CTAC_PSN_PK
AND CP.CTAC_PSN_ACTV_FLG = #ctacPsnActvFlg# AND CP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SP.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND CP.CTAC_PSN_PK = SP.CTAC_PSN_PK AND SP.EFF_FROM_DT <= #slsDt# AND NVL(SP.EFF_THRU_DT, '99991231') >= #slsDt# AND SP.DEL_FLG = #delFlg#
AND CPR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CT.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND CPR.CTAC_TP_CD = CT.CTAC_TP_CD AND CT.SPLY_IND_FLG = #splyIndFlg# AND CT.ACTV_FLG = #actvFlg# AND CT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND RIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SMM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DCD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DSC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND V.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CPR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY CP.CTAC_PSN_PK ASC

SELECT RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PK ,RIC.BLLG_MSTR_PK ,RIC.SER_NUM ,RIC.SVC_DLR_CD ,RIC.FNDG_DLR_CD ,RIC.ORIG_DLR_CD ,RIC.ADMIN_DLR_CD ,RIC.ISTL_COMP_AMT ,RIC.SVC_DLR_COMP_AMT ,RIC.EXT_WTY_COMP_AMT ,RIC.FNDG_DLR_COMP_AMT ,RIC.ORIG_DLR_COMP_AMT ,RIC.MLY_ADMIN_COMP_AMT ,RIC.RNW_COMP_AMT FROM ROSS_INTFC_CONTR RIC WHERE RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RIC.PRNT_BLLG_MSTR_ID = #prntBllgMstrId# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_STS_CD = #rossIntfcProcStsCd# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PROC_CD = #rossIntfcContrProcCd# AND RIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PK ,RIC.BLLG_MSTR_PK ,RIC.SER_NUM ,RIC.SVC_DLR_CD ,RIC.FNDG_DLR_CD ,RIC.ORIG_DLR_CD ,RIC.ADMIN_DLR_CD ,RIC.ISTL_COMP_AMT ,RIC.SVC_DLR_COMP_AMT ,RIC.EXT_WTY_COMP_AMT ,RIC.FNDG_DLR_COMP_AMT ,RIC.ORIG_DLR_COMP_AMT ,RIC.MLY_ADMIN_COMP_AMT ,RIC.RNW_COMP_AMT ,RIC.EZINTIME ,RICC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_COMP_PK FROM ROSS_INTFC_CONTR RIC ,ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_COMP RICC WHERE RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RIC.BLLG_MSTR_PK = #bllgMstrPk# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_STS_CD = #rossIntfcProcStsCd# AND RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RICC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PK = RICC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PK AND RIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RICC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY RIC.EZINTIME DESC
SELECT BC.BLLG_CYCLE_CD ,BC.BLLG_CYCLE_MTH_AOT FROM BLLG_CYCLE BC WHERE BC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND BC.BLLG_CYCLE_CD = #bllgCycleCd# AND BC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT ML.MTR_LB_CD ,ML.MTR_LB_NM ,ML.DEF_START_MTR_CNT ,ML.INTG_MDSE_CD ,ML.BLLG_MTR_LVL_NUM FROM MTR_LB ML WHERE ML.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
#mtrLbCd[]#
AND ML.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT CONTR_ADMIN_PSN_CD FROM ACCT_CONTR_ADMIN_RELN A WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND A.SVC_LINE_BIZ_CD = #svcLineBizCd# AND A.DS_ACCT_NUM = #dsAcctNum# AND A.ACTV_FLG = 'Y' AND A.EFF_FROM_DT <= #effFromDt# AND NVL(A.EFF_THRU_DT, #effFromDt#) >= #effFromDt#
